title: Patcher error 6.21

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
> [{quoted}](name=Aurora Borealis,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KpqKXH4V,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-19T14:58:11.093+0000)

Not even time enough to click "repair" on patcher because the error box pops out again.
Anyone else experiencing this?
**Waiting for fix.**

replies.body: the same happened to me. my connection is working fine because i also downloaded something earlier. also when i press retry, it will load a bit but stay stuck at 33% and then the error pops  back up
I get this too sigh its pretty annoying and I know for a fact its not my connection ._. soo

Thanks for the screenshot, it helps a lot!  At this point in the process, the patcher wants to download updates but is being blocked by a setting or poor connection.  Your best bet is to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide by following each step to tune up your network.  This should get you fixed up and back in game!
Same,not even that,is that i even tried to do everything on the forums,EVERYTHING,nothing works, or i get that error when i'm on 33% or im stuck on 99% for fuck ton of time and just giving up.
